typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		UpdatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	skipLines: 1) ~> CustomersSource
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		AddressCreatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		AddressUpdatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	skipLines: 1) ~> AddressesSource
